page.title: 06VILLAGE LIFE - LEISURE
page.content: In Goldhanger village there is a central square and in it is a pump which works by turning a wheel at the side.The pump is 60 years old and is 175ft deep.The pump is painted black and silver.The pump is still used today by some people and it is said that the water makes a lovely cup of tea! The only leisure places are the pubs, receation ground and the village hall. In the village hall they have dances, shows,bazaars and jumble sales.There are two{pubs}in Goldhanger and their names are{The Cricketers and The {Chequers.Therecreation ground has two swings,a roundabout,a slide,a football pitch and a see-saw.There is a footpath by the side of the recreation ground which leads up to the sea wall.
